channel.title: Projects on Project Website
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Project Website

item.title: Conways Game of Life
item.description:
The famous Game of Life written in C# for Unity

Description

Contains not just Conways Game of Life but many other variations, things like highlife, and von neumann neighborhood, which are decently well-known, and also has variations like infection, in which green cells can infect white cells, causing them to spread rapidly, and a battle mode, where red and blue battle on even footing, as well as my personal favorite, wireworld, a turring-complete electrical wire simulation, quite a joy to watch.

item.title: MLEngine
item.description:
MLEngine is a C++ command line tool for linux aimed to allow easy iteration on different neural network designs

Description

Written from scratch in C++, MLEngine is a Machine Learning framework that allows a user to implement all sorts of machine learning concepts, currently does not support GPUs but bound to change one day. Highly optimized and customizable, a user can define what dataset to train on, the name of the model, model dimensions, activations, weight initilization, loss, scoring, and various other options that are used during training.

item.title: NBody Simulation
item.description:
Nbody Simulation is a real-time point simulation written in C++ and CUDA

Description

Simulates the gravitational effect different bodies would have on one another and displays them to the window using OpenGL. Can honestly generate some pretty beautiful simulations, and while working on this project I found myself getting quite distracted just watching it, it can simulate many thousands of points at a time and can even make use of CUDA to maintain a pretty good frame real-time.
